Have you considered "Tora! Tora! Tora!"? It's a classic film that really gets into the gritty details of the Pearl Harbor attack, and with an all-star cast like James Whitmore, Richard Anderson, and Martin Balsam, it's a must-see for any war movie fan. Plus, its unique "you are there" style will give you a real sense of what happened that fateful day.

If you're looking for something a bit more intense, I'd recommend "The Deer Hunter". This powerful film follows a group of friends as they navigate the traumas of war and its aftermath, featuring incredible performances from Robert De Niro, Christopher Walken, and John Savage.
